full_sentence: most foreigners ive met aren't emotionally stable. They're up and down and all over the place, constantly creating problems because they cant just get their heads down and stick with anything

Oh yea I agree lol! And the years supply of cheese cups soups from Home Bargains, face masks and pound shop bathbombs. They might even get lucky and find her stash of meal replacement drinks! Seriously though, I saw that Blue Dragon sauce she uses an entire bottle of for her 'meals', and it contains glucose fructose syrup. That stuff is really gross and it makes me feel quite ill if I accidentally eat something with it in  :/

topics.sentence_slice: face masks and pound shop bathbombs

full_sentence: These are just the people that are most likely to be able to get out of the country, you bastard. That doesn't mean they don't have a good reason for doing so. Old people aren't up for the trouble anymore. People that are sick are also not gonna be able to make it most likely. It's mostly young people (not only men by the way, there's a lot of women as well), sometimes with kids. It makes sense that it's these people that are migrating. They're most likely to make it to another country alive, and find decent jobs, and they still have their whole lives ahead of them which they don't want to live somewhere in a war/inhabitable place.
